mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( userId, password, userName, userTel, gender, birthDate, joinedDate) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{userTel}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{joinedDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT userId FROM users WHERE userName = #{userName} AND userTel = #{userTel}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{newPassword} WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (chatroomNum, reportedUser, reportTime, reportType, reportUser) VALUES (#{chatroomNum},#{reportedUser},${reportTime},#{reportType},#{reportUser})
